txt.en: You should speak with Thane Ordlac.
'Alas, my friend, it is too late. Fríthild has gone from us. Fríthbert is now Reeve of the Broadacres....'
You should speak with Reeve Fríthild.
Observe the festivities in the Mead Hall of Stoke
'We are able to enjoy this feast in peace due to the heroic efforts of our Reeve, Fríthild....'
'I ask you to raise your mug with me in her honour!'
Thane Ordlac is kneeling beside Reeve Fríthild.\n\nYou should bring the water to Thane Ordlac.
'Reeve Fríthild is a wise woman...I believe she must have a good reason for throwing a feast in the midst of war....'
'Take the children from here and summon someone to care for Fríthild's body.'
'Ah, [placeholder]...go fetch some water from the table over there.'
You have joined Reeve Fríthild and her guests in the Mead Hall of Stoke for a feast celebrating the victory at Bardh-dorám.
Bring the water to Thane Ordlac
'We are wasting time! Reeve Fríthild should not be sitting in this hall drinking, but leading her people against the enemy!'
'Perhaps...my own Thane is known for celebration amid ruin....'
Observe the feast in the Mead Hall of Stoke.
A mug of water sits on one of the tables below the dais.\n\nThane Ordlac instructed you to fetch a cup of water.

'Hail, [placeholder]! I am pleased that you were able to join us for this feast. While I remain uneasy about the outcome, I find that I am able to -- for the moment -- put aside my worries. You and Ordlac have my gratitude for this respite.\n\n'Please, join the festivities!'
